categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: An Imperial military interrogator was an owner of a slave named Gorn Sweevas during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY, he was interrogating Republic spies on Nar Shaddaa, when one of the spies suddenly used the Force to escape, release other prisoners and kill all Imperials present, including Sweevas' master. Sweevas himself escaped to safety and asked another Imperial to come into the lab and kill the rebelling slaves.
Gorn Sweevas's master was mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic heroic "Botched Interrogation."
